title: TazL0v3r
author: TazL0v3r
content: Looking for someone to help me get some BTC in exchange for cashapp funds. I am only looking to do $50 but cashapp keeps denying my verification for BTC transactions to send out. I have attempted half a dozen times. If anyone can help please let me know. I can show I am owner of funds loaded to cash app and bank records to prove if wanted. Hoping for a smooth quick transaction with someone trusted because I will send first.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: TheChin0s on April 14, 2023, 10:50:43 PMWasted timeHow your time has been wasted? Op has not posted the telegram id. Have you communicated via bitcointalk forum? If you communicated via forum then would you like to provide details about how OP wasted your time.
